about_the_game:
Bring your horror-ific fantasies and desires to life with this new Zombie man Generator! Now you can create spooky, horrific, haunting man-zombies and enemies with all the flesh, blood and gore you want!

This pack makes it easier than ever to create original zombie characters for your epic RPG project by offering zombie eyes, unique hairstyles, blood marks and stitches, zombie facial features, accessories and awesome outfits!

The more original characters you create, the more original your story becomes! So go ahead and get inspired with this new character generator!!

FEATURES:

* Zombie: 3 male (with white eyes, with no eye lids, with no eye balls)
* Zombie Facial marks: 2 bloody marks + 2 dents in skin + 1 stitches = 5
* Zombie Face features: 3 sets of eyes, 3 noses, 3 mouths
* Accessories: 6 headwear + 4 bloody items = 10
* Front hair: 2 male
* Rear hair: 4 male
* Clothes: 20 Male (14 casual outfits + 6 cosplay outfits = 20)
* This pack is the use for RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice. However, you may not sell your created game if it’s made with game development software other than the RPG Maker franchise or Visual Novel Maker.
